item.mastersword.sword_broken: My sword seems to be broken
item.mastersword.dual_wielding: No mortal soul can handle the power of wielding two Master Swords!
item.mastersword.bombchu: WIP - UNFINISHED - NOT FOR USE - Bombchu
block.mastersword.music_block: Temple of Time Music Generation Block
tooltip.mastersword.customsword.tooltip1: Draw upon the ancient hero's courage
tooltip.mastersword.customsword.tooltip2: and whirl forth a storm of timeless valor
tooltip.mastersword.hylianshield.tooltip: known for its unmatched durability and timeless design.
It symbolizes the unwavering courage of a hero.
tooltip.mastersword.mirror_shield_oot.to: A radiant shield that reflects not just light,
but the very essence of courage and hope.
tooltip.mastersword.hero_shield.tooltip2: Forged in the fires of courage,
tooltip.mastersword.hero_shield.tooltip3: this legendary shield embodies the spirit of the hero.
Bathed in the light of a Great Fairy,
Its gleaming surface can return even the most fearsome attacks.
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_shield_dark.t: A legendary shield once corrupted with dark magic,
Now a testament to the balance between light and shadow.
tooltip.mastersword.triforce.tooltip1: A sacred relic, embodying the essences of Power, Wisdom, and Courage, said to have the power to make the ones wish come true
tooltip.mastersword.triforce.tooltip2: Also, it seems to react when close to your Tempered Master Sword.
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_bottle_healin: Let it mend your wounds or keep it
close for hope when all seems lost.
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_bottle_navi.t: Provides hints and can retaliate when her companion is attacked
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_bottle_tael.t: Periodically cleanses harmful effects from her companion
Enhances the power of the Master Sword's beam attack
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_bottle_leaf.t: 5% chance to double the wielder's sword strike damage
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_bottle_neri.t: 5% chance to grant absorption before taking damage
tooltip.mastersword.hylian_bottle_golden: Combined powers of most other fairies
A legendary fairy sent directly from the Golden Goddesses to aid to a true hero
tooltip.mastersword.ocarina_fairy.toolti: Fairy magic lingers in its gentle tones
tooltip.mastersword.ocarina_of_time.tool: Attune to the melodies of time and destiny
message.mastersword.no_songs_unlocked: You do not know any songs yet.
tooltip.mastersword.boomerang.tooltip1: Can damage enemies, retrieve distant items and activate buttons and switches
tooltip.mastersword.fire_rod.tooltip1: Harness Din's Fire and release a scorching Fireball
tooltip.mastersword.ice_rod.tooltip1: Channel the Frozen Domain and unleash the Zora's Icy Vengeance
tooltip.mastersword.fairy_bow.tooltip1: A powerful bow once wielded by a Hero lost to time
tooltip.mastersword.hookshot.tooltip1: A tool once used by an ancient hero to
tooltip.mastersword.hookshot.tooltip2: grapple and traverse to distant areas
tooltip.mastersword.sheetmusicbase.toolt: Learn this song for the Ocarina
tooltip.mastersword.sheetmusiczeldaslull: A sacred melody passed down through the royal family
tooltip.mastersword.sheetmusiceponassong: A soothing melody that calls forth a loyal steed
tooltip.mastersword.sheetmusicsongofstor: A mysterious tune that brings forth tempests
tooltip.mastersword.sheetmusicsunssong.t: An ancient song that commands day and night
message.mastersword.already_received_far: You have already received Farore's blessing here.
message.mastersword.already_have_farore_: You already possess the sacred flame of Farore.
message.mastersword.give_farore_blessing: May Farore's courage guide your path.
message.mastersword.nayru_reset_riddles: The sacred flame of Nayru has been rekindled. The cycle begins anew.
message.mastersword.already_received_nay: You have already received Nayru's blessing here.
message.mastersword.already_have_nayru_i: You already possess the sacred flame of Nayru.
message.mastersword.nayru_incorrect_ridd: is not the answer Nayru seeks.
riddle.mastersword.feather:
I take to the wind, soar in the sky,
Lay your head on me, close your eyes.
riddle.mastersword.torch:
At night in the dark, I provide a guiding light,
Twinkling from afar, in the sky's vast height.
riddle.mastersword.book:
A vessel of knowledge, with pages to read,
In a library's silence, is where you'll find me.
riddle.mastersword.water_bucket:
In the heart of the desert, where the sun's heat does blaze,
I'm a source of refreshment, found in oases.
riddle.mastersword.spider_eye:
With pointed fangs and a venomous bite,
I'm a creature feared, in the darkness of night.
riddle.mastersword.rose_bush:
With petals of beauty, colors so bright,
I'm a gift of affection, a fragrant delight.
riddle.mastersword.flint_and_steel:
A spark of fire, bane of a liar,
A useful tool, needed to cook your gruel.
riddle.mastersword.ender_pearl:
A shard of night, a traveler's boon,
Throw me afar, and I'll take you to the moon.
riddle.mastersword.leather:
From creatures of field, I am obtained,
A versatile material, by artisans trained.
riddle.mastersword.carrot:
A crunchy snack, so crisp and bright,
Underground treasure, growing in soil's embrace tight.
riddle.mastersword.iron_ingot:
I'm a sturdy metal, a construction's aid,
Forged into shape, an adventurer's tools made.
message.mastersword.already_received_din: You have already bested Din's trial here.
message.mastersword.already_have_din_inv: You already possess the sacred flame of Din.
message.mastersword.din_giant_spawn: A mighty presence awakens as the ground trembles beneath your feet. Din has summoned forth a colossal test of power! Prepare for battle!
message.mastersword.din_giant_slain: The ground shudders as the colossal guardian falls, its immense power fading into the wind. Din's trial has been conquered, and the power of it's sacred flame can now be claimed.
message.mastersword.sword_broken: My sword seems to be broken.
message.mastersword.dual_wielding: No mortal soul can handle the power of wielding two Master Swords!
message.mastersword.already_have_fairy: You already have a fairy following you.
message.mastersword.bow_broken: My bow seems to be broken.
message.mastersword.ice_rod_broken: My ice rod seems to be broken.
message.mastersword.fire_rod_broken: My fire rod seems to be broken.
message.mastersword.take_this: It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.
message.mastersword.navi_hint_nether_sta: Navi: Bathe the fallen star beneath the endless night of the starlit void.
message.mastersword.navi_hint_blessed_ne: Navi: I think we can use the blessing to unlock the Master Sword's true strength.
message.mastersword.navi_hint_fairy_bow: Navi: I sense a magical synergy between your bow and the bottled Healing Fairy. Maybe combining them could create something special!
message.mastersword.navi_hint_tempered_s: Navi: The Triforce seems to be reacting to your Tempered Master Sword!
message.mastersword.not_your_fairy: This fairy belongs to someone else!
message.mastersword.learned_song_of_time: You've learned the song - Song of Time!
message.mastersword.learned_suns_song: You've learned the song - Sun's Song!
message.mastersword.learned_song_of_stor: You've learned the song - Song of Storms!
message.mastersword.learned_eponas_song: You've learned the song - Epona's Song!
message.mastersword.learned_zeldas_lulla: You've learned the song - Zelda's Lullaby!
message.mastersword.no_epona_here: Epona's Song does not seem to work here.
message.mastersword.need_triforce: You need the Triforce to make a wish!
message.mastersword.life_wish2: Full HP, Hunger, Saturation, Absorption, Regeneration
message.mastersword.boomerang_wish2: Upgrade the Boomerang to the Magic Boomerang
message.mastersword.hero_shield_wish2: Upgrade the Hero Shield to the Mirror Shield(ALttP)
message.mastersword.hylian_shield_wish2: Upgrade the Hylian Shield to the Mirror Shield(OoT)
